xhr.data:
The easy way is learning Handow in practice - [Install local SHM instance](/documents/HandbookSHM)

Strongly recommend reading [Handow Outline](/documents/Handow_Outline) before heading into Handow details

All documents are listing in [Documents Index](/documents/Documents_Index).


## Getting Started with handow-seed

Handow is an easy tool, I believe you can handle it after looking through the following chapters in an hour. Actuall they are several live demos - a little bit code with practice is more than thousands of words.

In order to play the demo immediately, please clone and install the demos project. ([Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) is reuqired)

```bash
# clone handow-seed from Github
$ git clone https://github.com/newlifewj/handow-seed.git

# install dependencies under the root path
$ npm install
```

> The **handow-seed** is a E2E test project implements **Handow** and **Handow-SHM**. With it installed on your local machine, you can run the demos of the documentation by **Handow CLI** or start the SHM server explore and run demos with SHM UI.


_Go to_ [> Basic story for essential features](/documents/Basic_Story)

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:89.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/89.0

(//*[@id="handowui-root"]//div[@class="markdown-body"])
presented
